duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a direct line to customers, proactively sharing knowledge and providing a positive customer experience.
Handle customer inquiries and provide support, including billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, and support for the company's website and mobile app.
Adapt to each customer, focusing on efficiently solving their problems with low customer effort and a consultative approach.
Maintain emotional resilience to manage feelings and find positive aspects in most situations.
Utilize technology and learning resources to efficiently resolve customer problems and reduce customer effort.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four year college degree preferred. Completion of required additional training.
